attributes.action: The Government should have final say when expelling an undesirable person from the UK.
attributes.additional_details: It appears to be happening more and more. If the UK Border Agency and The Government make the decision that a persons presence in the United Kingdom is not in the interest of public safety or the security of the nation, it should be final. The courts should have a responsibility to keeping the people of Britain safe. We have the right to a family life too!
